name: Star Wars: Demolition
storyline:
The galaxy is engulfed in a devastating civil war. But on the Outer Rim world of Tatooine, crime lord Jabba the Hutt continues to prosper amidst the chaos.

Involved in almost every criminal venture, the Hutt has amassed a vast fortune through gambling, smuggling, and other vile acts. Yet his greed knows no bounds.

The Empire has outlawed the dangerous Podraces, but Jabba has devised an even more dangerous underground contest to attract high-stakes gamblers from across the galaxy to his betting parlors on Tatooine....
summary: Star Wars: Demolition is a vehicular combat game set in the Star Wars universe created by both Luxoflux and LucasArts using the Vigilante 8 game engine. The premise of the game is that the Galactic Empire declares they have officially banned Jabba the Hutt's podraces, so Jabba creates a more life-threatening vehicular combat contest to replace the sport of podracing.
